summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Transfer del Sur VTC website. Verified responsive design across mobile/tablet/desktop, 4-language translation system, updated pricing table (+20€), vehicle selector with 3 Mercedes options, and full booking form functionality.
passed_tests: Language selector functionality (ES, EN, IT, DE with content changes)
Price table verification (+20€ increase: Marbella 95€ sedan/115€ van)
Vehicle selector with 3 Mercedes options (E-Class, V-Class, S-Class)
Booking form complete functionality (all fields working)
Navigation between sections (Hero buttons, mobile menu)
WhatsApp integration with correct phone number (+34600221794)
Form validation and user input handling
Visual feedback for vehicle selection (amber highlighting)
